EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Gartner Data and Analytics Summit_Q118.Post Event Email - Gartner
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for connecting at Gartner Data & Analytics Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for connecting with us at Gartner Data & Analytics Summit. We hope you found the conference experience as valuable as we did!
Pivotal is passionate about supporting our customers as they navigate a dynamic data landscape that requires both agility and stability. Pivotal helps some of the world’s largest organizations transform the way they build software and get the most out of their data.
Let's keep the conversation going! Please join us for Greenplum Summit <[[http://greenplumsummit.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gartner-das-q118]]> at PostgresConf <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018]]> happening April 16-20 in Jersey City. Greenplum Summit is where decision makers, data scientists, analysts, DBAs, and developers will meet to discuss, share, and shape the future of advanced data technologies. A single pass gives you full access to both PostgresConf and Greenplum Summit. Use code 2018_GPDB to get a 25% discount when you register <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/buytickets]]>.
In the meantime please check out these additional resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/gartnercom?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gartner-das-q118]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
